lead_paragraph: Justice Samuel Alito actively dislikes a longstanding precedent protecting public-union funding. Now he has another chance to kill it.

headline.print_headline: A Big Threat to Public Unions
headline.main: At the Supreme Court, a Big Threat to Unions

snippet: Justice Samuel Alito actively dislikes a longstanding precedent protecting public-union funding. Now he has another chance to kill it.
abstract: Editorial warns that case involving California public-school teacher's union, to be heard by Supreme Court, threatens to undermine 1977 court ruling allowing public-sector unions to charge both members and nonmembers for costs of collective bargaining; underscores negative consequences and precedent that would result from overturning decision.
